decision_conditions: This approval relates to the following proposed changes to the existing approval:

Amendments to the existing approved lorry route (LBH approval reference 75596/APP/2021/402) under Schedule 17 paragraph 21(1) of the High Speed Rail (London - West Midlands) Act 2017, to / from Worksite 1: (Dews Lane) and Worksite 2: (Colne Valley Viaduct South Embankment, Ickenham ATFS platform and Colne Valley Viaduct piers 1-19 and other ancillary works), proposed as TLRN(A40), A412, Moorfield Road, Moorhall Road, Moorhall Road Roundabout, Harvil Road (between its junctions with Moorhall Road and Dews Lane) and Dews Lane, for a duration of 4 weeks only, from 12th June 2023 to 9th July 2023.
description: Non material change to an approval given under Part 1 of Schedule 17 (75596/APP/2021/402: approval of lorry routes in connection with the construction of the Colne Valley Viaduct, to and from the Dews Lane and Viaduct South Embankment worksites via TLRN (A40), Swakeleys Road, Harvil Road and Dews Lane). The amendment (diversionary route) to the existing approved LGV route to / from said worksites is proposed as TLRN(A40), A412, Moorfield Road, Moorhall Road, Moorhall Road Roundabout, Harvil Road (between its junctions with Moorhall Road and Dews Lane) and Dews Lane, for a duration of 4 weeks only, from 12th June 2023 to 9th July 2023.
